alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 21 at 5:05PM CDT until September 21 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT/515 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of north central Nebraska, including the following county, Cherry. * WHEN...Until 615 PM CDT /515 PM MDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 503 PM CDT /403 PM MDT/, While heavy rainfall is decreasing over the area, runoff from earlier heavy rainfall will likely continue to produce minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Valentine and Highway 97 crossing the Niobrara River. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
